attributes.action: Put any taxes raised from airlines directly into finding a way to plugging the hole in the ozone layer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of just inventing a new tax which only hurts UK airlines and airports, for no  
other reason than to line the government's pocket in the name of the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
